notes: It is a [[Rat]] Boss that is generally made for lower levels to kill. Looks like a regular [[Cave Rat]]. Spawns with 2 [[Rat]]s and 3 [[Cave Rat]]s.
name: Munster
behaviour: Munster runs when seriously injured also moves object that are in his way. If a weak creature is blocking its path, Munster will kill it in order to reach target.
location:
[[Rookgaard]], Free Account Main Rat Caves, on the second floor.

MunsterAttack.png|Munster's melee attack
MunsterSummon.png|Munster summoning two rats
munster grimera.JPG|Munster with [[Bone Club]] in loot
</gallery></noinclude>
strategy: Kill the summoned [[Rat]]s, then proceed to kill [[Munster]].
